bannedDependencies.message: * Use junit:junit, not junit:junit-dep * Use org.hamcrest:hamcrest-core and org.hamcrest:hamcrest-library, not org.hamcrest:hamcrest-all * Use CacheFactoryManager from com.atlassian.servicedesk:servicedesk-internal-base-api instead of VCache

bannedPlugins.message: * Use the official AMPS plugin, not the Service Desk forked AMPS plugin!
